items.title: Microsoft’s most affordable 12-inch Snapdragon Surface Pro Copilot+ PC keyboard bundle is $200 off today
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Best Buy that drops Microsoft’s 12-inch Surface Pro Copilot+ PC in Platinum finish down to $699.99 shipped. You are looking at a bundle with a trackpad-equipped keyboard that normally sells for $900, and today’s deal delivers a solid $200 discount. It’s the lowest price we’ve seen so far for this base model Surface Pro with 16GB of RAM and a 256GB SSD. It’s a great deal to cash in considering the Surface Pro alone in the same configuration is fetching $800 without the keyboard. More details are waiting for you below.

With that coupon the price is coming off its full $90 rate to roughly the same price that has been frequent since October’s Prime Day ended. While we have seen it go as low as $63 (last seen in September 2025), you’re still looking at a solid 15% markdown that cuts $14 off the tag for the best price we have tracked in the last three to four months.
